# deviceVerificationNonce

**Instance Property**

The UUID for computing the device verification value.

## Declaration

```swift
var deviceVerificationNonce: UUID { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the lowercased nonce when computing the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/VerificationResult/deviceVerification-69lvx] value.

This value is identical to the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/deviceVerificationNonce] value in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction].

## Getting properties for transactions

- **jwsRepresentation**: The transaction signed by the App Store, in JWS Compact Serialization format.
- **deviceVerification**: The device verification value to use to verify whether the transaction belongs to the device.
- **signedDate**: The date that the App Store signed the JWS transaction.
- **headerData**: The header component of the JWS transaction.
- **payloadData**: The payload component of the JWS transaction.
- **signedData**: The transaction data that the signature applies to.
- **signatureData**: The signature component of the JWS transaction.
- **signature**: The signature component of the JSON web signature.
